function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Economy hit by 3-6% gdp","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reduced mobility causing industries to shut down","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on supply chain and construction industry","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of exclusive study on the impact of covid-19 on the construction industry","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting exploratory interviews with construction experts without proper protective measures may lead to the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using questionnaire surveys without proper safeguards can result in the transmission of contagious diseases.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data analysis involving physical interaction and close collaboration may pose a risk of disease transmission.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using random sampling technique for data collection","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Selection of sample size based on unlimited population","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Pandemic causing suspension of construction projects","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Workers and technical engineers working with full consciousness and scrutiny","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Off-site workers and project participants required to maintain constant communication and coordination","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Modification of construction management to accommodate sudden crises","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Suspension of projects due to contagious virus","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Time overrun due to pandemic control period","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Financial impact due to economic deterioration and project suspensions","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious virus in construction sites","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fluctuation of material price and shortage of materials and supply chains","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of workers in urgent medical facility projects","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinformation and conspiracy theories about the pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of international cooperation in responding to contagious diseases","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misconception that climate change is a distant threat and less urgent than immediate crises.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Underemphasis of the impacts of climate change on public health in public debates.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Climate change leading to increased deaths in developing countries","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Long-term acceptance of lockdown measures due to temporary nature","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perception of climate change as a crisis with temporary solutions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global nature of climate change and covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Differences in national responses to covid-19 pandemic","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinterpretation of pandemic measures for climate change response","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Indoor air pollutants causing annual loss of disability-adjusted life years dalys and economic losses.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Traditional ieq monitoring protocol involving high-cost, invasive environmental sensors with limited spatial dimension and data storage.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of ieq information interaction with occupants","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of synchronization between objective and subjective data in ieq studies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to achieve simultaneous data collection of objective ieq data and occupant opinions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contagious diseases transmission through shared mobile interface and web platform","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of integration between objective and subjective ieq data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assessing room acoustic performance in an unoccupied room with hvac running and closed windows may not accurately reflect real-life conditions for disease propagation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Data transmission failure due to network interruption or device malfunction.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate software design for data presentation and human-computer interaction","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of multi-source data access increases the risk of spreading contagious diseases if proper hygiene and safety measures are not in place.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Mobile interface and qr code scanning for building occupants may pose a risk of viral transmission if hygiene practices are not followed.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Real-time ieq data assessment through the mobile interface creates an environment for potential virus exposure among the occupants if proper sanitization measures are not in place.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Measurement results not within the compliance range","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Weighting scheme not reflective of occupants’ priorities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lowered weight of illuminance","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Weighting scheme subject to revision","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited historical ieq data query on mobile interface less than one day","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Subjective bias in ieq voting module","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Passive acceptance of ratings leading to biased feedback","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Co-location of ibem devices with reference sensors in an office environment may lead to potential contamination and spread of contagious diseases if proper hygiene and cleaning protocols are not followed.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
